body:
Oh, I should have added: the problem is on the right-hand side of the assignment. That is,

```
cc_library(
    name = "downstream_alt",
)

platform(
    name = "alt_platform",
    flags = [
        "--@upstream//:label_flag=:downstream_alt",
    ],
    constraint_values = HOST_CONSTRAINTS,
)
```

works fine.

From a quick glance, it seems that this can be easily fixed by changing this line:

https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/38ade70fed4b34043d21a606717ad2ed1ee9c696/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/skyframe/config/ParsedFlagsFunction.java#L68

to `OptionsParser.builder().withConversionContext(key.packageContext()).build()`
Thanks for finding that, @Wyverald. Any chance you can send a PR for the fix (and, ideally, a test)? If not I can try next week but I'm a bit overloaded.

It would be great if we could fix this one. Although there's a workaround, it's pretty brittle (e.g., the exact string you need to use changed with https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/60924fdc2972184494f6382d39e8c786aa14b9a9 from `@@upstream~//:alt` to `@@upstream+//:alt`)

issue.title: Clean up tests in platform_based_flags_test.
